DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether medication call VyvanseÂ® ( lisdexamfetamine ; LDX ) impact cognitive functioning , specifically measure sustain attention , verbal encode recall work memory , menopausal age woman . LDX medication use treat attention deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) . The cognitive difficulty menopausal woman report experience typical adult diagnose ADHD . The investigator assess whether LDX effective alleviate cognitive disruption compare placebo .
DOC.criteria: Women age 45 60 eligible study : Are within 5 year last menstrual period ; Are able give write informed consent ; Must clear urine toxicology screen upon recruitment ; Are fluent write spoken English ; Must negative urine pregnancy test still menstruate . History seizures ; History cardiac disease include know cardiac defect conduction abnormality ; Abnormal electrocardiogram screening ; Use estrogen therapy within previous 6 month ; Current pregnancy planning become pregnant . Presence contraindication treatment stimulant medication ; would include presence hypertension , coronary disease , atrial fibrillation , arrhythmia .
